#summary Library helper methods

= Introduction =

This page lists all helper methods that lets you connect the default types and operators of the Java world and the !Reactive4Java library.

= Actions =

The {{{hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.Actions}}} utility class lists static helper methods that can be used to work with the {{{hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.Action0}}} and {{{hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.Action1}}} classes, which involves typical transformations from and to {{{Runnable}}}s.

|| *Method* || *Description* ||

= Functions =

The {{{hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.Functions}}} utility class lists static helper methods that can be used to work with the {{{hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.Func0}}},{{{hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.Func1}}} and {{{hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.Func2}}} classes.

|| *Method* || *Description* ||

The role of the following classes is to support the library's various operations (mostly) internally.
